comment: Ms. Hankins' class set the basis for everything I learned in TCOM, especially when it comes to being a perfectionist! She loves the details. She teaches from experience, not from a degree, which I think is a breath of fresh air in an academic setting. Highly recommended!

She is a good teacher. This class can be very difficult at times so just do the work in her class and your grade will reflect on what you do. She also grades very harshly at time expecting perfection but overall she wasn't as bad as I heard. I would recommend her

She is a very nice teacher and will let you re-do almost all the assignments as long as you show significant revision. She packs the classes with relevant information, and gives assignments that transfer to real world knowledge. Very well organized and will even come on the days you have off for "studying" if you have questions. Great teacher.
Hardest English class I've taken so far at SPSU.
ample opportunities to do assigned work cause of her stiff grading.  Brings real world knowledge to every class meeting

Show up for class and you'll be fine, or don't show up and fail.  Assignments are very easy, just make sure your format is EXACTLY like it is in the book.  Lectures usually turn into class discussions, not real interesting but not real boring either.  Very knowledgeable.  I would take her again.

She was very organized and knowledgeable about the material.  She always referred to real-world situations and involved students in the discourse.  There were alot of small assignments and a couple of big ones but they were not difficult or unreasonable.
Okay professor.  Do your assignments and don't miss your presentations (Did I say presentations? Yep, I did).

I took this class this semester with her and my wife got in a serious car wreck. And because I missed 4 days of class due to the fact my wife's life was in jepoardy the woman failed me. I did all the work and got high B's and A's too. But I still failed.
Very bad professor. Rude towards students. Not clear in instructions. Do not take a class from this woman unless you want to fail it.
